twoSetSkill.name: Tireless Warrior 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Deals 30.0% more Fire DMG; after spending no less than 25 SP in once action, the team gains Fyreheart for 18s (triggering this again resets the duration).

threeSetSkill.name: Feared Champion 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description:
When spending no less than 60/120 SP in one action, Fyreheart triggered thereupon causes enemies affected by Warhaunt to take 17.0%/20.0% more Total DMG.
(Warhaunt effect does not stack.)
Fu Hua equip bonus: Minimum SP cost to activate Fyreheart is reduced to 15.
